      • addSlaveObserver

        public void addSlaveObserver(MoveNotifier observer)
        Description copied from interface: MoveNotifier
        Adds lower rank observer MoveNotifier#updateMove(client.Room.MoveNotifier, utilities.messages.Move) method. There might be only one slave in implementing class thus this method should be used strictly by implementing class
        Specified by:
        addSlaveObserver in interface MoveNotifier
        Overrides:
        addSlaveObserver in class Player
        Parameters:
        observer - Slave observer

      • updateMessage

        public void updateMessage(MoveNotifier src,
                          Message msg)
        Description copied from interface: MoveNotifier
        Method called by Master/Slave Observable for passing lower/higher various messages. This method should not be used for passing Moves, rather for new board or messages.
        Parameters:
        src - Source of move
        msg - msg sent by source.

      • notifySlaveObserversAboutMove

        public void notifySlaveObserversAboutMove(Move move)
        Description copied from interface: MoveNotifier
        Notifies all observers lower in rank with given move.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to notify a slaves about.

      • notifySlaveObserversAboutMessage

        public void notifySlaveObserversAboutMessage(Message msg)
        Description copied from interface: MoveNotifier
        Notifies all observers lower in rank with given message. Moves should be strictly send by notifyXXXObserveraboutMove()
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to notify a slaves about.
